form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE, Form 1-357

full_text: NARA, 9/22/2023 DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service MEMORANDU OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE Place Los Angeles, Calif File No. A 21 344 739 CIN Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: Name SEX DATE OF BIRTH NGUYEN, Than Thi F 10/21/15 Street Address 2999 Mendoza Dr. #A PLACE OF BIRTH City, State, Zip Costa Mesa, California 92626 Hung Yen, Vietnam NATIONALITY COUNTRY TO WHICH CHARGEABLE (If any) PREFERENCE (If any) Vietnamese PRIORITY DATE REMARKS Indochina Refugee NONPREFERENCE: Section 212(a)(14) certification not required because: Individual section 212(a)(14) certification issued Blanket section 212(a)(14) certification issued under the following provision of law: Sec 203(h) of the I & N Act Sec 249 of the I & N Act Sec 214(d) & N Act Private Law no. of the Sec 244( )( ) of the I & N Act Sec 1 of the Act of 11/2/66 Congress session Sec 245 of the I & N Act Sec 13 of the Act of 9/11/57 Public law 95-145 6 (Other law Specify) As of 75 at Los Angeles, California (Month) (Day) (Year) PORT OF ENTRY FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE Class of admission (Insert symbol) RECOMMENDED BY: (Immigration Officer) (Date) DD ACTION DATE OF Lawre FOR USE BY VISA CONTROL OFFICE DISTRICT Los 9188 6-18-79V.R.S.
